For hemodynamic stabilization SSC recommend treatment goal mean arterial blood pressure > 65mmHg ( MAP ) , central venous blood pressure 8-12 mmHg , mixed venous oxygen saturation > 65 % , central venous oxygen saturation > 70 % diuresis > 0.5 ml/kg/h ( 1 ) . According SSC guideline MAP > 65 mmHg aim blood pressure level tissue perfusion preserve . This base study ten septic shock patient norepinephrine titrate three level ( 65 , 75 85 mmHg ) author conclude parameter tissue perfusion differ level ( 2 ) . Objective To evaluate hemodynamic protocol guide parameter tissue perfusion could reduce duration vasopressor treatment septic shock patient . Methods Patients suffer septic shock require vasopressor support randomly assign control group ( usual care ) intervention group ( tissue perfusion guide protocol ) . In intervention group parameter tissue perfusion use guide hemodynamic therapy .
